calculateBorrowRate().details: Calculate dynamic borrow rate based on utilization rate Similar to AAVE's interest rate model

returns.borrowRate: The annual borrow rate in percentage (scaled by 100)

calculateSupplyRate().details: Calculate supply rate based on borrow rate and utilization Supply rate = Borrow rate * Utilization rate * (1 - reserve factor)

returns.supplyRate: The annual supply rate in percentage (scaled by 100)

emergencyResetPosition(address).details: Only callable by factory owner in emergency situationsThis resets ALL user state including liquidity (use with caution)

params._user: The address of the user whose position to reset

returns.utilizationRate: The utilization rate in percentage (scaled by 100)

liquidatePosition(address,uint256).details: This function resets user's borrow shares, collateral, and related variablesUser liquidity shares remain untouched as they're not related to borrowing

params._repayAmount: The amount of debt being repaid
params._user: The address of the user being liquidated

reduceUserCollateral(address,uint256).details: Called by Position contract during collateral withdrawal for liquidation

params._amount: The amount of collateral being removed
params._user: The user whose collateral is being reduced

addressPositions(address).notice: Mapping of user to their position contract address

emergencyResetPosition(address).notice: Emergency function to completely reset a user's position

lendingPool().notice: Address of the lending pool contract

liquidatePosition(address,uint256).notice: Liquidates a user's position and resets borrow/collateral state

reduceUserCollateral(address,uint256).notice: Allows position contract to reduce user collateral during liquidation

totalBorrowAssets().notice: Total borrowed assets from the pool

totalSupplyAssets().notice: Total supply assets in the pool

userBorrowShares(address).notice: Mapping of user to their borrow shares

userCollateral(address).notice: Mapping of user to their collateral amount

userSupplyShares(address).notice: Mapping of user to their supply shares
